record.dc:title: SNL/CA Environmental Management System Program Manual.
record.dc:creator: Larsen, Barbara L.
record.dc:description: The Sandia National Laboratories, California (SNL/CA) Environmental Management System (EMS) Program Manual documents the elements of the site EMS Program. The SNL/CA EMS Program conforms to the International Standard on Environmental Management Systems, ISO 14001:2004. Elements of the ISO standard overlap with those of Department of Energy (DOE) Order 450.1, thus SNL/CA's EMS program also meets the DOE requirements.
record.dcq:publisherResearch: Sandia National Laboratories (SNL-CA), Livermore, CA (United States)
